titleStmt.title: East Tennessee and Georgia Railroad Company

availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

org.orgName: East Tennessee and Georgia Railroad Company

body.p: Incorporated as the Hiwassee Rail Road Company in 1836. Named changed to East Tennessee and Georgia Railroad Company in 1848. Consolidated with the East Tennessee and Virginia Rail Road Company in 1869 to form the East Tennessee, Virginia and Georgia Railroad Company.

ab.bibl: Interstate Commerce Commission Reports: Volume 37, Valuation Reports. Decisions of the Interstate Commerce Commission of the United States. November, 1931 (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1932), pp. 213-214.
